name: Trendex - We Tokenize Talent
long_description:
Trendex.gg is a groundbreaking fan engagement and tokenization platform built at the intersection of sports, entertainment, and Web3.

We partner directly with world-class athletes and celebrities to create official, one-of-a-kind digital tokens - each backed by real image and tokenization rights.

Fans can buy, trade, and use these tokens across Trendex’s growing ecosystem - from IRL rewards like signed memorabilia and meet-and-greets, to the first decentralized fantasy football game that rewards players in SOL based on real match performances.

With Trendex, fans no longer just watch the game - they own a part of it.
Join us in building a fair, transparent, and player-powered future for sports and entertainment.
one_liner: Bringing the world's greatest athletes on-chain with Official Token…
